class_notes: Using the lens of sex and gender, in IDS 205 we will ask: what do we believe and what role does science play in that? What is the nature of scientific evidence? How does it compare to other types of evidence? What counts as evidence in science? In other disciplines? What are the histories of the answers to these questions? How do they affect our everyday lives? Co-requisite: ENGRD 223
course_description: IDS205 addresses: What is the nature of scientific evidence? How does it compare to other types of evidence? What counts as evidence in science? In other disciplines? What are the histories of the answers to these questions? How do they affect our everyday lives? Co-requisite: ENGRD 223
prerequisites: ENGRD 223 or equivalent transfer credit as co-requisite.
